form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION BY LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT ALIEN, FORM 1-51

full_text: Screened by NARA 6/29/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved OMB No. 43-R0040 Immigration and NaturalizalibSepvide APPLICATION Applicant: Do BY LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT ALIEN FILE NO. NO Not Fill FEE In This REC'D Block AT LOS Nationality Code the Fee Required Fee Not Required FOR ALIEN REGISTRATION RECEIPT CARD Fee Stamp FORM I-151 (Please read Attached Instructions) File attached 10/4/28 1. I hereby apply for an Alien Registration Receipt Card for the following reason (Please check appropriate blocks:) (a) My alien registration receipt document was lost destroyed on or about under the following circumstances: (Date) (If my document is recovered, I will surrender it to the Immigration and Naturalization Service.) (b) My name has been changed (c) My present Form I-151 is mutilated. My evidence of alien registration (d) (e) I never received Form I-151. is on a form other than Form I-151. I am required by Section 262(b) of the Immigration and (g) My present Form I-151 is in poor con- Nationality Act to be registered and fingerprinted (f) after my 14th birthday. dition because of improper lamination. I am an alien commuter taking up actual permanent (h) I received an incorrect Form I-151. (i) residence in the U.S. My commuter Form I-151 is surrendered herewith. (If you checked (a), (b), (c) or (e) above, see Instruction Number 7 concerning fee required.) 2. FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 4. Nationality YOUR NAME CORRALES-Meza, Luis Mexican 3. NUMBER AND STREET (Apt. No.) MAILING 3216 Gracia Street 5. Alien Registration Number 6. Sex ADDRESS CITY STATE ZIP CODE Male Female IN U.S. Los Angeles California 90039 A14 115 644 7. Dates of Absences From U.S. of 1 Year or Longer, Since Lawful Admission for Permanent Residence n.a 18. (If you intend to use Form I-151 as a document for travel within the next six weeks, give the date of your expected departure, list each country to be visited, and be sure to read Instruction 8 in regard to the limitations on use of Form I-151 for travel in or through certain countries.) a.
